shared.model

Class user

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.model.user

  • public class user
extends java.lang.Object
    A user, which has some personal data and authentication data, and the number of records indexed by that user.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      user(java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String lastName, java.lang.String uName, java.lang.String password, int records, int userID)
      Construct a new user

    • Method Summary

      assign a batch to this user
      int getRecords()
      reveal how many records this user has indexed
      boolean hasBatch()
      reveal whether a batch is assigned
      userToken token()
      get a userToken, representing this user, which can be used for authentication during server operations
      void updateRecords(int add)
      update the count of records indexed by this user

      reveal which batch has been assigned

        Construct a new user

        firstName - user's first name
        lastName - user's last name
        uName - user's username
        password - user's password
        records - how many records have been indexed

    • Method Detail

      • updateRecords

        public void updateRecords(int add)
        update the count of records indexed by this user
        Parameters:
        add - how many new records have been done

      • getRecords

        public int getRecords()
        reveal how many records this user has indexed
        Returns:
        the number of records already indexed

      • assignBatch

        assign a batch to this user

      • hasBatch

        public boolean hasBatch()
        reveal whether a batch is assigned
        Returns:
        true if batch assigned, false otherwise

      • whichBatch

        public int whichBatch()
        reveal which batch has been assigned
        Returns:

      • token
